rules_text:
Untap target land.
Reveal the top card of your library. If it’s a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Put X +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It’s still a land.
special_text:
[+1]: Untap target land.
[+1]: Reveal the top card of your library. If it’s a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
[-X]: Put X +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It’s still a land.
